original_text: His eyes will become red because he drinks so much wine. His teeth will become white because he drinks so much milk.
korean_text: 그의 눈은 포도주로 인하여 붉겠고 그의 이는 우유로 말미암아 희리로다

sentences.original_text: because he drinks so much wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너무 많은 포도주를 마시기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: because he drinks so much milk
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너무 많은 우유를 마시기 때문입니다
